alert.note: Alert for Coastal Georgetown; Darlington; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 1:39PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Florence, western Georgetown, south central Darlington and Williamsburg Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 137 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated a line of strong thunderstorms extending from near Elgin to near Summerton and southward to near Walterboro. This line was moving toward the east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Lake City, Kingstree, Andrews, Timmonsville, Johnsonville, Pamplico, Lamar, Hemingway, North Santee, Rhems, Cades, Oatland, Nesmith, Morrisville, New Hope, Warsaw, Hyman, Effingham, and Francis Marion University. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Seek shelter at an indoor location prior to the arrival of this line of storms.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Georgetown; Darlington; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Williamsburg
